verses.text: And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , set thy face against Gog , the land of Magog , the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal , and prophesy against him,\f + \fr 38.2 \ft the chief…: or, prince of the chief\f*
And say , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O Gog , the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal :

And I will turn thee back , and put hooks into thy jaws , and I will bring thee forth , and all thine army , horses and horsemen , all of them clothed with all sorts \add of armour, even\add* a great company \add with\add* bucklers and shields , all of them handling swords :
Persia , Ethiopia , and Libya with them; all of them with shield and helmet :\f + \fr 38.5 \ft Libya: or, Phut\f*
Gomer , and all his bands ; the house of Togarmah of the north quarters , and all his bands : \add and\add* many people with thee.
Be thou prepared , and prepare for thyself, thou, and all thy company that are assembled unto thee, and be thou a guard unto them. \p

¶ After many days thou shalt be visited : in the latter years thou shalt come into the land \add that is\add* brought back from the sword , \add and is\add* gathered out of many people , against the mountains of Israel , which have been always waste : but it is brought forth out of the nations , and they shall dwell safely all of them.
Thou shalt ascend and come like a storm , thou shalt be like a cloud to cover the land , thou, and all thy bands , and many people with thee.

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; It shall also come to pass, \add that\add* at the same time shall things come into thy mind , and thou shalt think an evil thought :\f + \fr 38.10 \ft think…: or, conceive a mischievous purpose\f*

And thou shalt say , I will go up to the land of unwalled villages ; I will go to them that are at rest , that dwell safely , all of them dwelling without walls , and having neither bars nor gates ,\f + \fr 38.11 \ft safely: or, confidently\f*

To take a spoil , and to take a prey ; to turn thine hand upon the desolate places \add that are now\add* inhabited , and upon the people \add that are\add* gathered out of the nations , which have gotten cattle and goods , that dwell in the midst of the land.\f + \fr 38.12 \ft To take…: Heb. To spoil the spoil, and to prey the prey\f*\f + \fr 38.12 \ft midst: Heb. navel\f*

Sheba , and Dedan , and the merchants of Tarshish , with all the young lions thereof, shall say unto thee, Art thou come to take a spoil ? hast thou gathered thy company to take a prey ? to carry away silver and gold , to take away cattle and goods , to take a great spoil ? \p
¶ Therefore, son of man , prophesy and say unto Gog , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; In that day when my people of Israel dwelleth safely , shalt thou not know \add it\add*?
And thou shalt come from thy place out of the north parts , thou, and many people with thee, all of them riding upon horses , a great company , and a mighty army :

And thou shalt come up against my people of Israel , as a cloud to cover the land ; it shall be in the latter days , and I will bring thee against my land , that the heathen may know me, when I shall be sanctified in thee, O Gog , before their eyes.

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \add Art\add* thou he of whom I have spoken in old time by my servants the prophets of Israel , which prophesied in those days \add many\add* years that I would bring thee against them?\f + \fr 38.17 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*
And it shall come to pass at the same time when Gog shall come against the land of Israel , saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \add that\add* my fury shall come up in my face.
For in my jealousy \add and\add* in the fire of my wrath have I spoken , Surely in that day there shall be a great shaking in the land of Israel ;

So that the fishes of the sea , and the fowls of the heaven , and the beasts of the field , and all creeping things that creep upon the earth , and all the men that \add are\add* upon the face of the earth , shall shake at my presence , and the mountains shall be thrown down , and the steep places shall fall , and every wall shall fall to the ground.\f + \fr 38.20 \ft steep…: or, towers, or, stairs\f*
And I will call for a sword against him throughout all my mountains , saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: every man’s sword shall be against his brother.

And I will plead against him with pestilence and with blood ; and I will rain upon him, and upon his bands , and upon the many people that \add are\add* with him, an overflowing rain , and great hailstones , fire , and brimstone.
Thus will I magnify myself, and sanctify myself; and I will be known in the eyes of many nations , and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
